notes: Estimated population movement in Haiti as of 8 November 2016. The estimated distribution of people for whom their home Commune/Section Communale in the pre-hurricane period was in either Grande Anse, Sud or Nippes départment, and as of 8 November had moved to another Commune/Section Communale. Estimates are based on movements of de-identified Digicel SIM cards which made or received at least one call pre-hurricane and in the week up to 8 November 2016. The SIM card movements are combined with available population data derived from estimates for the year 2015.
